===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[rise up]]; to [[get up]]
# {{non-gloss definition|placed after a verb to indicate that the action has been completed}}
#: {{zh-x|忙 起來{lai}|''to get busy''}}
#: {{zh-x|熱 起來{lai}|''to get hot''}}
#: {{zh-x|好 起來{lai}|''to get better''}}
#: {{zh-x|發展 起來{lai}|''to begin to develop''}}
# {{non-gloss definition|placed after a verb to form a copular verb}}

#: {{zh-x|他 看 起來{lai} 很 有 活力。|He looks very energetic.}}
